mapper.select: select Id,LineName,Information,Region,TravelSituation,MaxNumber,MinNumber,City,PicturePath,Stopped,Sort from Line order by isnull(Sort,99999),CreateDate desc

select max(a.Id)Id,max(a.LineName)LineName,max(a.Information)Information,max(a.Region)Region, max(a.TravelSituation)TravelSituation,max(a.MaxNumber)MaxNumber,max(a.MinNumber)MinNumber,max(a.City)City, max(a.PicturePath)PicturePath from Line a join Price b on a.Id = b.LineId where a.LineName like #{line_Name} group by b.LineId
